description:
The Strauss Law Offices in Nanuet, New York, is the medical malpractice and personal injury litigation firm of choice for people in southern New York State and throughout northern New Jersey seeking superb legal representation. Our practice aggressively pursues cases in New York City including New York County (Manhattan), Richmond County (Staten Island), Kings County (Brooklyn), and Bronx County. We have convenient meeting locations in New York City.

We stand ready to put our well over 30 years of legal and medical experience to work for the victims of catastrophic injuries, medical malpractice or wrongful death. From the initial free consultation by telephone, at a convenient meeting location or at our law offices, our clients come to trust us to handle their cases with compassion, empathy and skill. We prove to our clients that we are dedicated to representing their best interests and achieving their goals and objectives.

Meet Our Founder

Jeffrey E. Strauss, Esq., earned his Juris Doctor at the Western Michigan University-Cooley Law School after earning a Master of Science degree in applied anatomy and physiology from Boston University and undergraduate medical science studies at Rutgers University. With this thorough grounding in both law and medicine, attorney Strauss then worked for the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services Office of General Counsel in New York City focusing on Medicare appeals. He next honed his skills through associations with law firms specializing in medical malpractice, industrial and construction accidents, and serious motor vehicle crash cases.

Desiring to establish a smaller firm capable of giving clients more personalized attention and representation, attorney Strauss formed the Strauss Law Offices. He is licensed to practice in all New Jersey, New York and Washington, D.C., courts, as well as before the United States District Court for the Southern District in Manhattan, U.S. Court of Appeals for the 3rd Circuit and the United States Supreme Court.
